entities.name: houses
entities.description: The four houses that held up the school are mentioned in the first stanza. The text describes them as pillars and mentions their names later on.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses that held up the school. It departed from the school, leaving the other houses downhearted.

entities.name: founders
entities.description: The founders are mentioned as the original four people who created the school and its houses.

entities.name: sorting_hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical object that sorts students into their respective houses. It is mentioned in the poem as being present to sort the students.

entities.name: dueling
entities.description: Dueling and fighting are mentioned as activities that were happening at the school.

entities.name: fighting
entities.description: Fighting is mentioned as an activity that was happening at the school.

relationships.description: The houses turned against each other and sought to rule, but Slytherin departed from the school.
The founders created the four houses that held up the school.
The Sorting Hat sorts students into their respective houses.
Dueling and fighting were happening at the same time.
